entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 16 except 8 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 16 except 8 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 16.
